detail_desc: Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Shorter printed satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, fasteners at the back and long, tapered puff sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Top in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with a small V-neck at the back of the neck and buttons at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a decorative bow at the front. Unlined.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly and button, and fake pockets.

Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with lace details, a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam under the bust with pleats and a lace trim, and a seam at the hem with a lace trim and wide, pleated flounce. Lined bodice and a short inner skirt.
Off-the-shoulder top in stretch jersey with lace details, elastication and a wide flounce at the top, 3/4-length, flounced sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Cardigan in a soft mohair-blend knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and no buttons.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Studio Collection. Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a low waist, medium coverage at the back and zigzag seams around the edges. The polyamide content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.

Jacket in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with notch lapels and concealed fasteners at the front. Chest pocket, concealed pockets in the side seams and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem with a single back vent. Lined at the top.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with raw edges around the neckline and sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Fleece-lined jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front, a zipped chest pocket and flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Adjustable tab and elastication at the cuffs, folded seams and reflective details. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Dungarees in soft, superstretch denim with decorative buttons at the top, a kangaroo pocket and elastication at the back. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Set consisting of a hair clip, two hair grips, one hair elastic and a pair of earrings decorated with plastic beads. Length of hair clip and grips 5.5-6.5 cm. Length of earrings 3.5 cm.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck opening at the top and small stand-up collar with gathers and ties at the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Blouse in airy viscose crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.
Small shoulder bag with a zipped outer compartment, a zip at the top, a narrow shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5.5x14x18.5 cm.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High slit in one side.
Bucket hat in pile with a satin lining. Width of brim approx. 5.5 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a wool weave with notch lapels, buttons at the front,a chest pocket and jetted front pockets. Grosgrain ties at the waist that can be fastened to create a more tailored fit. Long sleeves with a slit, buttons and decorative buttonholes at the cuffs. Lined.
Bikini top with a decorative ring at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in a fine, patterned knit with ribbing around the neckline and hem and long sleeves with roll edges at the cuffs.
Short, straight-cut dress in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Unlined.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, textured fine-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, covered elastication at the waist, short legs and a lined front.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Leather belt with embroidery and a metal buckle. Width approx. 2.8 cm.
Loose-knit bolero with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a ribbed edge around the opening. No fasteners.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Shorts in stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Glittery Alice band with ears on the top.
Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and small text appliqué at the hem.

Short fancy dress costume in lace with a V-neck, lined cups with a silicone trim at the top and bodice with support panels and a zip at the back. Lined skirt and underskirt in a double layer of tulle.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Single-breasted jacket in a woven Tencel™ blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. One chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Slides in imitation leather with twisted straps at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles.

Bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle and carabiner hook. One zipped mesh outer compartment and two mesh inner compartments. Lined. Size 22x29 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with long sleeves and a seam at the waist. Half-lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.
Large, elasticated imitation leather scrunchie.
Short-sleeved shirt in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket, and short slits in the sides.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, chunky-knit alpaca blend with a fluffy finish. High, ribbed collar, a zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in soft velour with a sparkly stone appliqué and print motif at the top. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood and a zip down the front. Lined.
Top in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a smocked bodice and frill-trimmed square neckline. Short, wide sleeves with wide elastication at the top. Gently flared peplum at the hem.
Mules in imitation leather with covered heels, square toes and a wide foot strap. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket skinny-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a concealed zip in one side seam and a seam with a wide panel at the hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper knitted in a mohair and wool blend with long dolman sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pile jacket with a wide collar and visible zip down the front. Diagonal side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with small, frilled sleeves, a collar and buttons at the top. Inset lace trims at the front and waist.and flared skirt with a flounced hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short raglan sleeves with a flounced trim, a seam at the waist and a seam below with a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.
Cardigan in fine-knit premium cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves.

Long dress with a lace bodice and skirt in an airy weave. Scalloped V-neck with support panels at the top, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Long lace sleeves with scalloped trims, a seam at the waist with a grosgrain band and concealed, adjustable elastication, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Piqué section over the foot, elasticated tops and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirt in printed cotton with a wider neckline. Slightly longer at the back.
